English.Text: In the best interest of both our nations, I, Vasco Oliveira Silva, servant of His Majesty King Jo√£o of A Coroa, compromise to surrender the piece of the Sceptre of Capon currently in my custody, namely the pommel of the Sceptre, in the event of my failing to discover the final piece of the Sceptre (the eagle) first, so long as the counterparty agrees to do the same in the opposite event.
